00054 template < typename Container, typename Key >
00055 bool has( const Container& other, const Key& key ) {
00056    return other.find( key ) != other.end();
00057 }
00059 template < typename Key >
00060 bool has( const MC2String& other, const Key& key ) {
00061    return other.find( key ) != MC2String::npos;
00062 }

00071 struct RefLess {
00072    template <typename Ptr>
00073    bool operator ()( const Ptr* first,
00074                      const Ptr* second ) const {
00075       // redirect to the real comparision function
00076       return *first < *second;
00077    }
00078 };

00081 // Dereferences the pointer and uses == to compare the objects
00082 template <typename T>
00083 struct RefEqualCmp {
00084    explicit RefEqualCmp( const T& obj ):
00085       m_obj( obj ) { }
00086 
00087    bool operator () ( const T* ptr ) const {
00088       return m_obj == *ptr;
00089    }
00090    const T m_obj;
00091 };

00098 template <typename Result, typename Class>
00099 struct accumulate_cb_t {
00100    typedef Class argument_type;
00101    typedef Result result_type;
00102 
00103    accumulate_cb_t(std::const_mem_fun_t<Result, Class> f):m_func(f) {}
00105    result_type operator ()(result_type sum, 
00106                            const argument_type* type ) const {
00107       return sum += m_func(type);
00108    }
00109    result_type operator ()(result_type sum, 
00110                            const argument_type& type ) const {
00111       return sum += m_func(&type);
00112    }
00113 private:
00114    std::const_mem_fun_t<Result, Class> m_func;
00115 };
00116 
00125 template <typename Result, typename Class>
00126 accumulate_cb_t<Result, Class>
00127 accumulate_cb(std::const_mem_fun_t<Result, Class> f ) {
00128    return accumulate_cb_t<Result, Class>( f );
00129 }
00130 
00131 template <typename Result, typename Class>
00132 accumulate_cb_t<Result, Class>
00133 accumulate_cb(Result (Class::*f)() const)
00134 {
00135    return accumulate_cb_t<Result,Class>( std::mem_fun( f ) );
00136 }
00137 
00138 template <typename Result, typename Class>
00139 accumulate_cb_t<Result, Class>
00140 accumulate_cb(Result (Class::*f)())
00141 {
00142    return accumulate_cb_t<Result,Class>( std::mem_fun( f ) );
00143 }

00152 template<class ITERATOR>
00153 class it_dumper {
00154 public:
00155   
00156    it_dumper( const ITERATOR& begin,
00157               const ITERATOR& end,
00158               const char* sep = " ") :
00159          m_begin(begin),
00160          m_end(end),
00161          m_sep(sep) {}
00162 
00163    friend ostream& operator<<( ostream& o, const it_dumper& dumper ) {
00164       const char* cursep = "";
00165       for ( ITERATOR i = dumper.m_begin; i != dumper.m_end; ++i ) {
00166          o << cursep << *i;
00167          cursep = dumper.m_sep;
00168       }
00169       return o;
00170    }
00171    
00172 private:
00173    ITERATOR m_begin;
00174    ITERATOR m_end;
00175    const char*     m_sep;
00176 };
00177 
00178 template<class ITERATOR>
00179 it_dumper<ITERATOR> it_dump( const ITERATOR& begin,
00180                              const ITERATOR& end,
00181                              const char* sep = " " ) {
00182    return it_dumper<ITERATOR>( begin, end, sep );
00183 }

00193 template<class CONTAINER>
00194 class co_dumper {
00195 public:
00196 
00197    co_dumper( const CONTAINER& container,
00198               const char* sep = " " ) : m_cont( container ),
00199                                         m_sep( sep ) {
00200    }
00201    
00202    friend ostream& operator<<( ostream& o, const co_dumper& dumper ) {
00203       const char* cursep = "";
00204       for ( typename CONTAINER::const_iterator i = dumper.m_cont.begin();
00205             i != dumper.m_cont.end();
00206             ++i ) {
00207          o << cursep << *i;
00208          cursep = dumper.m_sep;
00209       }
00210       return o;
00211    }
00212 private:
00213    const CONTAINER& m_cont;
00214    const char*      m_sep;
00215    
00216 };

00220                               const char* sep = " " )

00229 template <typename A, typename B>
00230 struct DualForwardIterator: 
00231       public std::iterator<std::input_iterator_tag, A> {
00232 
00233    typedef B SecondBlockIterator;
00234    typedef A* FirstBlockIterator;
00235 
00236    DualForwardIterator(FirstBlockIterator firstBlockBegin, 
00237                        FirstBlockIterator firstBlockEnd, 
00238                        SecondBlockIterator secondBlockBegin ):
00239       m_firstBlock( firstBlockBegin ),
00240       m_firstBlockEnd( firstBlockEnd ),
00241       m_secondBlock( secondBlockBegin ) { 
00242    }
00243 
00244    DualForwardIterator<A,B>& operator ++() {
00245       if ( m_firstBlock == m_firstBlockEnd ) {
00246          ++m_secondBlock;
00247       } else {
00248          ++m_firstBlock;
00249       }
00250       
00251       return *this;
00252    }
00253 
00254    DualForwardIterator<A,B> operator ++(int) {
00255       DualForwardIterator<A, B> tmp( *this );
00256 
00257       if ( m_firstBlock == m_firstBlockEnd ) {
00258          ++m_secondBlock;
00259       } else {
00260          ++m_firstBlock;
00261       }
00262       
00263       return tmp;
00264    }
00265 
00266    bool operator == (const DualForwardIterator<A, B>& comp ) const {
00267       return 
00268          comp.m_firstBlock == m_firstBlock &&
00269          comp.m_secondBlock == m_secondBlock;
00270    }
00271 
00272    bool operator != ( const DualForwardIterator<A, B>& comp ) const {
00273       return ! ( *this == comp );
00274    }
00275 
00276    A& operator *() {
00277 
00278       if ( m_firstBlock != m_firstBlockEnd ) {
00279          return *m_firstBlock;         
00280       }
00281 
00282       return *(*m_secondBlock);
00283    }
00284 
00285    const A& operator *() const {
00286 
00287       if ( m_firstBlock != m_firstBlockEnd ) {
00288          return *m_firstBlock;
00289       }
00290 
00291       return *(*m_secondBlock);
00292    }
00293 private:
00294    FirstBlockIterator m_firstBlock;
00295    const FirstBlockIterator m_firstBlockEnd;
00296    SecondBlockIterator m_secondBlock;
00297 };

00318 template <typename Pair>
00319 struct select2nd : public unary_function<Pair,typename Pair::second_type>
00320 {
00321    const typename Pair::second_type& operator() ( const Pair& p ) const {
00322       return p.second;
00323    }
00324    typename  Pair::second_type& operator() (  Pair& p ) const {
00325       return p.second;
00326    }
00327 };

00342    return select2nd<typename T::value_type>();

00346 template <typename Pair>
00347 struct select1st : public unary_function<Pair,typename Pair::first_type>
00348 {
00349    const typename Pair::first_type& operator() ( const Pair& p ) const {
00350       return p.first;
00351    }
00352    typename  Pair::second_type& operator() (  Pair& p ) const {
00353       return p.first;
00354    }

00359 template <typename T>
00360 struct identity: public unary_function< T, T > {
00361    T& operator()( T& t ) {
00362       return t;
00363    }
00364    const T& operator()( const T& t ) const {
00365       return t;
00366    }
00367 };
00368 
00369 template <typename T>
00370 identity<typename T::value_type> makeIdentity( const T& val ) {
00371    return identity< typename T::value_type >();
00372 }

00374 // generator
00375 template <typename T>
00376 class Counter {
00377 public:
00378    Counter(T start):m_counter(start) { }
00379    T operator()() {
00380       //Shall be postfix so that the return value is correct.
00381       return m_counter++;
00382    }
00383 private:
00384    T m_counter;
00385 };

00391 class printTime
00392 {
00394    const MC2String m_format;
00396    time_t m_time;
00397 public:
00406    printTime( time_t time, const MC2String format = "%FT%T%z" ) : 
00407       m_format(format), m_time(time)
00408    {}
00415    friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& str, const printTime& pt)
00416    {
00417       struct tm split = {0};
00418       localtime_r( &(pt.m_time), &split );
00419       char buf[32] = "";
00420       if( 0 == strftime( buf, sizeof(buf), pt.m_format.c_str(), &split ) ){
00421          *buf = 0;
00422       }
00423       return str << buf;
00424    }
00425 };
